Text: Plan vs Forecast Explanation Cc Below is our high level explanation of the Energy Operations including EOL increase in plan over forecast of million If you have any questions please let me know Energy Operations has experienced a increase in transaction growth as a result of EOL activity requiring additional resources to support this new business However resources have only increased at a rate of due to the efficient use of existing resources As a result the per unit cost of supporting individual transactions has decreased significantly in the to range Thanks Brian

Headcount for Cc Sally The attached file shows the detail of plan headcount for December through The only number that I still have a question about is for EGM December the number I have in the file only represents the people moving into Networks from EGM Brents group I left a message with Tom Myers to get the correct number I have also added the graphs that we discussed which show increase in headcount along with increase in deal counts If you have any questions let me know Thanks Brian

Updated Headcount File Cc Sally Attached is the updated of the headcount file I sent you on Friday I misunderstood the original request and provided December plan for all four years I have now updated the file with December actual headcount numbers for through and plan for I have also updated the EGM numbers and inserted a summary tab If you have any questions let me know Thanks Brian
